Title: Have a Summer
Writer: Adam F. Goldberg (created by), Chris Bishop (teleplay by), Adam F. Goldberg (story by), Lacey Marisa Friedman (story editor), Aaron Kaczander (staff writer)
Actors: Wendi McLendon-Covey, Sean Giambrone, Troy Gentile, Hayley Orrantia
Plot: Adam and his friends are concerned about Hell Week as new incoming freshmen are hazed by the seniors class. Adam gains respect after body slamming his brother during a school graduation ...
